S04n413:1: yathāhaṃ kulaputra buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtān,
S04n413:2: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04n413:3: ye mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n413:4: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto'drakṣaṃ,
S04n413:5: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n413:8: paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputra purime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekanavatibuddhakṣetraśatasahasrāṇyatikramya saṃpuṣpite lokadhātau vimalatejaguṇarājo nāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati |
S04n413:9: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
S04n413:10: mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitāḥ, peyālaṃ |
S04n413:11: purimāyāṃ diśi abhiratye buddhakṣetre akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato,
S04n413:26: etāṃ pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā kulaputra purimāyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ deśayato buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi |
S04n413:27: ye'nutpāditabodhicittāḥ pūrve'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā mayā ca prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
S04n413:28: mayā ca prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanītā yatra taiḥ sarvaprathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ ||
S04n413:29: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ saṃpuṣpitāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ |
S04n413:30: ye tatra bodhisattvāste tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tameva tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥ |
S04n413:31: “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadi idamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ bhagavata āsanaṃ prakaṃpitam[?“]iti |
S04n413:32: sa tathāgatastānavocat - “asti kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrānatikramya tatra sahā nāma lokadhātustatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati |
S04n413:33: sa etarhi caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n413:34: tena tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādapitāḥ,
S04n413:36: tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ;
S04n413:37: tena tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caratāhaṃ prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
S04n413:38: yatra me prathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n413:39: sa ca me śākyamunistathāgataḥ kalyāṇamitraḥ sahe lokadhātau tiṣṭhati yāpayati,
S04n413:40: sa evaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ imaṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n413:42: ko yuṣmākaṃ kulaputrotsahate madvacanāt sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gantuṃ śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ paripṛcchanāya?“ |
S04n413:44: “]ya iha bhadanta bhagavan saṃpuṣpite buddhakṣetre ṛddhimantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇapāramitāprāptāste'dya pūrvāhnasamaye mahāntamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvānyasmādbuddhakṣetrādvikurvyābhyāgatastenāyaṃ muhūrtaṃ pṛthivīcālaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiśca“ |
S04n413:46: “vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gamiṣyāmastaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāya paryupasanāya taṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāya“ |
S04n413:50: “tāmapi vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan diśaṃ na jānīmo yatra sahā lokadhātuḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ“ |
S04n413:51: tataḥ sa vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārya pañcabhyo'ṅgulibhyo vividhānyarciṃṣi pramumoca |
S04n413:54: yataste bodhisattvāḥ paśyanti sarvāvadimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvairgaganatale ca devanāgayakṣāsuraiḥ sphuṭaṃ |
S04n413:55: dṛṣṭvā ca punaste bodhisattvāstaṃ vimalaguṇatejarājānaṃ tathāgatamevamāhuḥ |
S04n413:56: “paśyāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvāvantaṃ sphuṭaṃ,
S04n413:57: nāsti tatrāvakāśo'ntaśo daṇḍanikṣepaṇamātramapi yanna sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ |
S04n413:58: paśyāmaḥ śākyamunistathāgato'smān nirīkṣate dharmaṃ ca deśayati“ |
S04n413:59: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgatasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmevamāha - “samantacakṣuḥ kulaputrāḥ śākyamunistathāgato |
S04n413:60: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau sattvā bhūmisthitā vā antarīkṣasthitā vā tataścaikaikaḥ sattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
S04n413:61: “maṃ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sarvacetasā nirīkṣate mamaikamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati“ |
S04n413:62: sarvavarṇaṃśca sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati ekavarṇasthānaṃ |
S04n413:63: ye ca tatra kulaputra sattvā brāhmabhaktāste śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ brahmāṇaṃ samanupaśyanti,
S04n413:72: ye maheśvarabhaktikāste sattvā maheśvararūpavarṇasaṃsthānavacanavyāhāreṇa śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti |
S04n413:73: yāvaccaturaśītistatra sattvānāṃ varṇasaṃsthānabhaktirūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi te tathā caiva śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti“ |
S04n413:74: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi rahagarjito nāma bodhisattvo dvitīyaśca jyotiraśmirnāma bodhisattvaḥ |
S04n413:76: “gacchatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ madvacanādārogyakauśalyaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatha“ |
S04n413:78: “sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ |
S04n413:79: na cātraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo'sti kṣitau gagane vā yatra vayaṃ pratitiṣṭhemaḥ“ |
S04n413:80: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgata āha - “mā kulaputrā evaṃ vadatha,
S04n413:90: ekasmiṃ samaye kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā madhye śailaparvate indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati,
S04n413:93: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā tathāgatakāyena sphuṭā,
S04n413:95: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhir diśābhirdvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sahe lokadhātau yastasya parvatasyābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n413:96: sa ca kulaputra śākyamunistathāgatastatra parśadi ridhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān;
S04n413:97: sā ca sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā caivaṃ vipulā ca prādurbhūtā,
S04n413:98: yadā te dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sālaguhāyāṃ praviṣṭā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ paśyanti sma |
S04n413:99: ekaikaśca bodhisattvastatra tathāgatasya vividhabodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S04n413:100: ekaiko bodhisattvastatra saptaratnamayāsanaṃ nirmitavān yatropaviṣṭā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma |
S04n413:102: te ca bodhisattvāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā śākyamunestathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu saṃprasthitāḥ |
S04n413:103: aciraprakāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sālaguhā yathā paurvāṇāṃ saṃsthitā |
S04n413:105: sa caturaśītibhistrayastriṃśaddevasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sālaguhā yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati |
S04n413:109: sa ca pañcaśikho madhureṇa svareṇa bhagavantamabhimukhaṃ staviṣyati,
S04n413:112: atha pañcaśikho vīṇāṃ manojñena gītavāditena bhagavato'nubhāvena pañcabhiḥ stavaśatairbhagavato varṇamabhāṣata |
S04n413:113: yadā ca kulaputra pañcaśikha ārabdho bhagavato'bhistavanāya tataḥ sa śākyamunirbhagavān sughoṣavairocanaketuṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannastena samādhinā ye sahe lokadhātau maharddhikayakṣarākṣasā vāsurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā vā gandharvā vā sarve kāmāvacarā devā sarve rūpāvacarā devaputrāstatra sannipātā babhūvurye ca svarabhaktikāste svaraṃ śrutvā prasīdanti,
S04n413:114: ye varṇayaśobhaktikāste bhagavato varṇaṃ śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe tīvrapremaprasādagurugauravacitrīkārajātāḥ prasīdanti,
S04n413:116: tataḥ śākyamunirbhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya sālaguhāyā dvāraṃ darśāpayāmāsa |
S04n413:119: sa śākyamunistathāgata uvāca - “niṣīdadhvaṃ yakṣā yāvattasthuḥ samāgatāḥ“ |
S04n413:120: tataḥ sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā saṃsthitā yathā dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamā yakṣāstatra guhāyāṃ praviṣṭā,
S04n413:121: niṣaṇṇāyāśca tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgatastathārūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavāṃ;
S04n413:122: yathā ye tasmin parṣadi śrāvakayānikā niṣaṇṇāste śrāvakayānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04n413:124: ye ca tatra parṣadi anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhayānikāste śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti;
S04n413:125: tatra ca pañcaśikhagandharvapūrvaṃgamā aṣṭādaśanayutā avaivartikāḥ saṃsthitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
S04n413:130: sa ca tatra kauśikaḥ śakro bhayātparimukto,
S04n413:135: na śakyaṃ kenacittasya tathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalasya paryantamudgṛhītuṃ vā gaṇāyituṃ vā |
S04n413:141: yāvantaśca sattvā etarhi tatra sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitā yadi te sattvāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya kukṣau praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyuste ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasyaikaromamukhe praviśeyuḥ niṣkrameyuśca;
S04n413:142: te ekaromamukhāttasya tathāgatasya na śaktāḥ paryantamudgṛhītuṃ ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vāntaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā |
S04n413:145: yāvantaśca daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikasamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ sattvaistadyathāpi nāmaitarhi sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarve te sattvā etarhi sahe buddhakṣetre viśeyuḥ sarve te tatra vicareyuḥ |
S04n413:147: tathaiva tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ babhūva |
S04n413:149: sacetkulaputra yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sahasraṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ vistīrṇāḥ tadyathaitarhi sahabuddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇaṃ sattvaiḥ te sarve etarhi sahe lokadhātau praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyurevaṃrūpaṃ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpāditānuttarajñānapratilābhāya praṇidhānaṃ babhūva |
S04n413:151: ebhiścaturdharmairviśiṣṭataraḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato yathāvadgṛhṇīta yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ,
S04n413:152: gacchatha paścimāṃ diśaṃ yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ,
S04n413:153: mama vacanena taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ ārogyakauśalyaṃ pṛcchata“ |
S04n413:154: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgataścandrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā raharājasya bodhisattvasya jyotiraśmeśca bodhisattvasya datvāha - “gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ“ |
S04n413:156: “]vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gacchemaḥ tathāgatānubhāvena sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya śākyamunestathāgatasya darśanāye vandanāya paryupāsanāya“ |
S04n413:158: tau ca dvau bodhisattvau raharājaśca jyotiraśmiśca sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasya riddhibalena tataḥ saṃpuṣpitāyā lokadhātoḥ saṃprasthitā ekacittakṣaṇenedaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthātaḥ |
S04n413:160: “asti bhagavan purastime digbhāge ekonanavatibuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyatikramya tatra saṃpuṣpito nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04n413:162: sa ca punastathāgato bodhisattvagaṇaparivārastathāgatasya guṇavarṇakīrtayamāna evamāha - “śākyamunirnāma tathāgataḥ sahe buddhakṣetre tiṣṭhati yāpayati |
S04n413:163: tena ca tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenāhaṃ sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitastasya ca vacanena mayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niveśito,
S04n413:166: yathā teneme candrarocavimalā puṣpāḥ preṣitā ārogyakauśalyaṃ ca pṛcchati“ |
S04n413:168: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipattitaste cāpi dṛṣṭvākṣobhyasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ paripṛcchanti sma |
S04n413:171: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ purimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvā imaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya paripṛcchanāya pūjanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
S04n413:172: samanantaraparivāsito bhagavataḥ purimāyāṃ diśi buddhakṣetranāma parikīrtanaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ,
S04n413:174: “paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya tatra sarvaśokāpagato nāma lokadhātustatrāśokaśrīrnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati |
S04n413:175: mayā sa bhagavān sarvaprathamaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
S04n413:192: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyāsanāni kaṃpanti |
S04n413:193: sarve te buddhā bhagantaḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya varṇaṃ yaśaḥ kīrtimudīrayanti |
S04n413:194: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pṛcchanāya yāvaddharmaśravaṇāya“ |
S04n413:195: punaśca bhagavān āha - “paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt saptānavatibuddhakṣetranayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tatropaśāntamatirnāma buddhakṣetrastatra ratnagirirnāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati |
S04n413:196: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
S04n413:209: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ paścimāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yeṣāṃ śākyamuninā tathāgatena nāmāni parikīrtitāni teṣāmāsanāni kaṃpanti |
S04n413:210: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā yāvanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n413:217: punaḥ śākyamunirbhagavānāha - “paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputrottarapūrvāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādaṣṭānavatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tatra vijayaṃ nāma buddhakṣetraṃ,
S04n413:219: mayā sa tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
S04n413:221: yāvanmayā sarvaprathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
S04n413:224: yāvaccaturaśītisattvānāṃ varṇabhaktisaṃsthānarūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi tathā śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti |
S04n413:226: ekaḥ vigopaśikharo nāma dvitīyaḥ saṃrocanabuddho nāma;
S04n413:227: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājo nāma tathāgatastau dvau bodhisattvavāmantrayitvaivamāha - “gacchata yūyaṃ kulaputrau sahe buddhakṣetre,
S04n413:230: “sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavannāvāṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ |
S04n413:231: na ca tatraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo'sti kṣitau vā gagane vā yatrāvāṃ pratiṣṭhevahi“ |
S04n413:232: sa ca tathāgata āha - “mā kulaputraivaṃ vadata,
S04n413:243: ekasmin samaye kulaputra sa śākyamunistathāgato'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā viṣamaśailendraparvatamadhye indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati sma,
S04n413:246: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā sphuṭā tathāgatakāyena,
S04n413:248: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhyo digbhyaḥ dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sahe lokadhātau saṃprāptāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya |
S04n413:250: gṛhṇīdhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ;
S04n413:252: yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ;
S04n413:254: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājastathāgataḥ candrarocavimalān puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā vigopaśikharasya bodhisattvasya dadāti saṃrocanabuddhasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S04n413:255: evaṃ cāha - “gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ“ |
S04n413:257: “vayamapi bhagavan gamiṣyāmastathāgatasyānubhāvena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya“ |
S04n413:259: tatastau dvau bodhisattvau sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya tathāgatasya riddhyanubhāvena tato virajādbuddhakṣetrātsaṃprasthitāḥ,
S04n413:267: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti,
S04n413:269: evaṃ sālendrarājā vikramaraśmiḥ padmottaraḥ candano merurājaḥ sāgaraḥ sārajyotirjñānavikramastathāgataḥ |
S04n413:270: yāvattena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā uttarapurimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatāste bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalapuṣpairiha sahe buddhakṣetre saṃprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pṛcchanāya pūjanāya vandanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ||
S04n413:271: tāvadeva śākyamunistathāgata ṛddhyanubhāvena sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitāsteṣāṃ ekaikasya sattvasya yojanapramāṇamātramātmabhāvaḥ saṃsthitaḥ;
S04n413:272: sarvāvantaṃ ca sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaiḥ sattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ,
S04n413:273: na kaścidbuddhakṣetre kṣitau vā gagane vāvakāśo yaḥ sattvairasphuṭo'ntaśo'ñjanaśalākāpradeśamātramapi yaḥ sattvebhyo na sphuṭo'bhūt |
S04n413:274: sarve ca te sattvāḥ śūnyamākāśaṃ paśyanti,
S04n413:277: na lokāntarikā divyā vimānā ūrddhaṃ yāvadadho kāñcanacakraṃ tatorddhaṃ pṛthivī cakṣuṣo nābhāsamāgacchanti,
S04n413:280: tatra ca bhagavān ākāśasphuraṇaṃ dharmāvacchedapraśrabdhisamādhiṃ samāpanno |
S04n413:281: yataste candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ sarvaromamukhesu bhagavataḥ praviśanti |
S04n413:282: sarve ca te sattvāḥ paśyanti sahe lokadhātāvantargatā vigatāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaitasikeṣu manasikārarūpasaṃdarśanatāḥ,
S04n413:283: te caiva bhagavato romamukhe nirīkṣante sma |
S04n413:285: nānāratnavṛkṣaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānāpuṣpaṃ nānāphalākīrṇāṃ nānāvastraṃ nānācchatradhvajapatākākeyūramuktikāhārālaṅkṛtāṃstāṃ vṛkṣāṃ paśyanti,
S04n413:289: sarve ca te sattvā ye sahe lokadhātāvantargatāḥ,
S04n413:291: sarve pariśiṣṭāḥ sattvāstasya tathāgatasya romamukhebhyastathāgataśarīre praviṣṭāḥ |
S04n413:295: maitreyo bodhisattva āha - “saṃprajānaṃ tataḥ sattvāḥ samanvāharata sarve vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣau sannipatitāḥ“ |
S04n413:296: tataste sattvāḥ sāntarabāhiraṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ pratyakṣībhūtā “yathā vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣāvantargatāḥ sannipatitāśca“,
S04n413:300: tato maitreyaḥ sarvāvatī parṣadaṃ svareṇa vijñapayannuvāca - “śṛṇvantu bhavantastathāgatasyaivamṛddhivikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ yadasmākaṃ hitakaraḥ śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati tadyuṣmābhiḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhartavyāḥ“ |
S04n413:318: imasya khalu punardharmaparyāyasya bhāṣyamāṇasyāśītikoṭīgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāḥ sattvāstathāgatasya kukṣigatā avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
S04n413:319: gaṇanātikrāntāśca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye nānāvidhadhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā abhūn |
S04n413:324: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ purimāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ,
S04n413:325: purimāyāṃ diśi yadbuddhakṣetrānatikrāmanti na ca śākyamunestathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalaṃ pratihanyate,
S04n413:326: evaṃ ca tatra svaraṃ śṛṇvanti vicitrapadārthavyañjanāḥ,
S04n413:329: api ca tatrāpi śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
S04n413:330: śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyaḥ sphuṭo dṛśyate bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiścāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāścaikaromamukhe śākyamunestathāgatasya praviśanto niṣkrāmantaśca saṃdṛśyante |
S04n413:334: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā yāvadbhagavataḥ kāyāntargatāḥ sā bhagavataḥ kāyaromamukhebhyo niṣkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇī kṛtvā bhagavato'bhimukhaṃ pratyavasthādbhagavantameva vicitrārthapadavyañjanarutavyāhāraiḥ stavamānāḥ |
S04n413:335: atha tāvaccaiva kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā vicitrāṃ ca gandhamālyavilepanavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣitā,
S04n413:338: tatra vaiśāradyasamuddhāraṇirnāma bodhisattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “kiṃ nāmāyaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahāvyākaraṇaṃ sūtrāntaḥ?“ |
S04n413:349: punarapyāha - “kiyantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S04n413:350: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi?“ |
S04n413:353: yaḥ kaścidimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi,
S04n413:354: yaśca punaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāmantaśo likhitvā dhārayiṣyati,
S04n413:356: na tvevaṃ ṣoḍaśamahākalpān ṣaṭpāramitācaramāṇasya bodhisattvasya puṇyaskandhaḥ |
S04n413:358: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sayakṣanāgagandharvakumbhāṇḍapretapiśācakinnarāsurāṇāṃ duṣṭacittānāṃ prasādanaḥ,
S04n413:380: ko mamemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ rakṣiṣyati,
S04n413:381: adharmabhūmiṣṭhānāṃ sattvānāṃ bhinnaśīlānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ karṇapuṭe prakāśayiṣyati,
S04n413:383: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya;
S04n413:385: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ merupuṇyaṃ yakṣariṣiṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītavān |
S04n413:386: bhagavān āha - “udgṛhṇa tvaṃ maharṣa imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ,
S04n413:387: yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ deśāntaragatānāmavaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ karṇapuṭeṣu prakāśasva |
S04n413:388: adya cāvaivartikacittaṃ saṃjanayasvā-“ hai- “vaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃścaturaśītimahākalpā atikrāmantā yanmayā bhadanta bhagavan pūrvaṃ praṇidhānena yakṣariṣitvālabdhyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇo gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvā mayā caturṣu brāhmavihāreṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04n413:390: ahaṃ ca sattvānāṃ svayameva paripācayāmi yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ udgṛhīṣyati,
S04n413:392: idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
S04n413:395: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ |
S04n413:396: hevadatteṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādi mahāśramaṇaṃ ||
